Articles.Content: Hi there, I'm from Scotland. I've had KSP for a few months now, and I decided to join this forum yesterday. I've gone into orbit, but I haven't gone to any other moons or planets yet. My orbits tend to be elliptical and not round. I've made a few scientific orbiters and that's about it. I couldn't make planes in KSP if my life depended on it. So... yeah.

Hello theelectricspider39,

Glad to see that you have joined the community! If you ever have questions about orbits or getting to Mun/Minmus, feel free to post them. You can also visit the Gameplay Questions forum, where you're likely to get more help than you'd expect.

And don't worry, planes are tricky (especially with stock aerodynamics).

Welcome to the forums!

~Claw

Grettings, Mr. Electric spider of doom (Sorry, I've been watching too much Patrick). I also can't make that good of spaceplanes. I only got one as far as Minmus.

Anyway, enjoy your time here at the Forums. See ya around!
